actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To provide for a Federal program to stabilize medical malpractice insurance premiums.
short_title: Federal Medical Malpractice Insurance Stabilization Act of 2002

summary.text: Federal Medical Malpractice Insurance Stabilization Act of 2002 - Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide a program of automatic reinsurance from a national fund for medical malpractice insurance coverage claims in excess of $250,000.Directs the Secretary to establish the terms and conditions of such a program, including the premium amount to be charged for such reinsurance.

titles.title: Federal Medical Malpractice Insurance Stabilization Act of 2002
To provide for a Federal program to stabilize medical malpractice insurance premiums.
